items.title: Get started
items.text: For full documentation visit zensical.org.

items.title: Commands
items.text:
• zensical new - Create a new project
  • zensical serve - Start local web server
  • zensical build - Build your site

items.title: Admonitions
items.text:
Go to documentation

!!! note

This is a **note** admonition. Use it to provide helpful information.

!!! warning

This is a **warning** admonition. Be careful!

items.title: Details
items.text:
Go to documentation

??? info "Click to expand for more info"

This content is hidden until you click to expand it.
Great for FAQs or long explanations.

items.title: Code Blocks
items.text:
Go to documentation

``` python hl_lines="2" title="Code blocks" def greet(name): print(f"Hello, {name}!") # (1)!

greet("Python") ```

  1. Go to documentation

    Code annotations allow to attach notes to lines of code.

Code can also be highlighted inline: #!python print("Hello, Python!").

items.title: Content tabs
items.text:
Go to documentation

=== "Python"

``` python
print("Hello from Python!")
```

=== "Rust"

``` rs
println!("Hello from Rust!");
```

items.title: Diagrams
items.text:
Go to documentation

mermaid graph LR A[Start] --> B{Error?}; B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...]; C --> D[Debug]; D --> B; B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

items.title: Footnotes
items.text:
Go to documentation

Here's a sentence with a footnote.[^1]

Hover it, to see a tooltip.

[^1]: This is the footnote.

items.title: Formatting
items.text:
Go to documentation

  • ==This was marked (highlight)==
  • ^^This was inserted (underline)^^
  • ~~This was deleted (strikethrough)~~
  • H~2~O
  • A^T^A
  • ++ctrl+alt+del++

items.title: Icons, Emojis
items.text:
Go to documentation

  • :sparkles:
  • :rocket:
  • :tada:
  • :memo: :memo:
  • :eyes:

items.title: Maths
items.text:
Go to documentation

$$ \cos x=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^k}{(2k)!}x^{2k} $$

!!! warning "Needs configuration" Note that MathJax is included via a script tag on this page and is not configured in the generated default configuration to avoid including it in a pages that do not need it. See the documentation for details on how to configure it on all your pages if they are more Maths-heavy than these simple starter pages.

items.title: Task Lists
items.text:
Go to documentation

  • [x] Install Zensical
  • [x] Configure zensical.toml
  • [x] Write amazing documentation
  • [ ] Deploy anywhere

items.title: Text formatting
items.text: **bold text** *italic text* ***bold and italic*** ~~strikethrough~~ `inline code`

items.title: Links and images
items.text: [Link text](https://example.com) [Link with title](https://example.com "Hover title") ![Alt text](image.jpg) ![Image with title](image.jpg "Image title")

items.title: Lists
items.text:
``` Unordered: - Item 1 - Item 2 - Nested item

Ordered: 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item ```

items.title: Blockquotes
items.text:
```

This is a blockquote Multiple lines

Nested quote ```

items.title: Code blocks
items.text: ```javascript function hello() { console.log("Hello, world!"); } ```

items.title: Tables
items.text: | Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 | |----------|----------|----------| | Row 1 | Data | Data | | Row 2 | Data | Data |

items.title: Task lists
items.text: - [x] Completed task - [ ] Incomplete task - [ ] Another task

items.title: Escaping characters
items.text: Use backslash to escape: \* \_ \# \`

items.title: Line breaks
items.text:
``` End a line with two spaces to create a line break.

Or use a blank line for a new paragraph. ```
